Name: Good Chestnut Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
This chestnut mount enables you to Jag Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This chestnut mount enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will automatically fly toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
This chestnut mount enables you to Jag Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed.
